tool_description: Analyzes historical weather patterns to identify seasonal trends, averages, and variability for agricultural planning.

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis: seasonal_trends, monthly_averages, or variability_assessment

years_threshold.description: Minimum years of data required for reliable analysis (5-30)

error_messages: Insufficient data: Need at least the specified years_threshold of historical data for reliable analysis.
Data mismatch: Weather data and timestamps arrays must have the same length.
Invalid years threshold: Must be between 5 and 30 years.
usage: Input historical weather data with timestamps and specify analysis type. The tool calculates long-term patterns, seasonal averages, and climate variability metrics.

seasonal_averages.description: Average values for each season or month

trend_direction.description: Overall trend: increasing, decreasing, or stable
